languages.text: Прибитый к аквиле человек полностью изломан, словно его пропустили через камнедробилку. Судя по краям ран и обилию крови, крюки и гвозди вгоняли в несчастного при его жизни.

traits.locale_text: Прибитый к аквиле человек полностью изломан, словно его пропустили через камнедробилку. Судя по краям ран и обилию крови, крюки и гвозди вгоняли в несчастного при его жизни.

languages.text: The man nailed to the Aquila is completely broken, as if somebody shoved him into a stone crusher. Judging by the edges of his wounds and the amount of blood, the nails and hooks were driven into his flesh when he was still alive.
languages.original_text: Прибитый к аквиле человек полностью изломан, словно его пропустили через камнедробилку. Судя по краям ран и обилию крови, крюки и гвозди вгоняли в несчастного при его жизни.

traits.locale_text: The man nailed to the aquila is completely broken as if somebody shoved him into a crushing engine. Judging by the wound edges and the amount of blood, the nails and hooks had been driven into his flesh when he was alive.

The man nailed to the Aquila is completely broken as if somebody shoved him into a stone crusher. Judging by the wound edges and the amount of blood, the nails and hooks had been driven into his flesh when he was still alive.

The man nailed to the Aquila is completely broken, as if somebody shoved him into a stone crusher. Judging by the edges of his wounds and the amount of blood, the nails and hooks were driven into his flesh when he was still alive.

languages.text: アクィラに磔になっている男は、まるで誰かに砕石機に押し込められたように、すっかりぐちゃぐちゃになっている。傷口の先端と出血量から判断して、釘と針は男がまだ生きているうちに肉体へと打ち込まれたようだ。
languages.original_text: The man nailed to the Aquila is completely broken, as if somebody shoved him into a stone crusher. Judging by the edges of his wounds and the amount of blood, the nails and hooks were driven into his flesh when he was still alive.

traits.locale_text: アクィラに磔になっている男は、まるで誰かに砕石機に押し込められたように、すっかりぐちゃぐちゃになっている。傷口の先端と出血量から判断して、釘と針は男がまだ生きているうちに肉体へと打ち込まれたようだ。

languages.text: 这个被钉在双头鹰上的人几乎被碾成了肉泥，就好像有什么人把他丢进了碎石机里一样。从伤口边缘与出血量来看，他身上的钉子和钩子是在他活着的时候刺进肉里的。
languages.original_text: The man nailed to the Aquila is completely broken, as if somebody shoved him into a stone crusher. Judging by the edges of his wounds and the amount of blood, the nails and hooks were driven into his flesh when he was still alive.

traits.locale_text: 这个被钉在双头鹰上的人几乎被碾成了肉泥，就好像有什么人把他丢进了碎石机里一样。从伤口边缘与出血量来看，他身上的钉子和钩子是在他活着的时候刺进肉里的。

languages.text: L'homme cloué à l'Aquila est dans un état pitoyable, comme s'il était passé dans un concasseur. À en juger par ses blessures et la quantité de sang qui a dégouliné de ses plaies, il était encore vivant lorsque les clous et crochets ont été enfoncés dans son corps.
languages.original_text: The man nailed to the Aquila is completely broken, as if somebody shoved him into a stone crusher. Judging by the edges of his wounds and the amount of blood, the nails and hooks were driven into his flesh when he was still alive.

traits.locale_text: L'homme cloué à l'Aquila est dans un état pitoyable, comme s'il était passé dans un concasseur. À en juger par ses blessures et la quantité de sang qui a dégouliné de ses plaies, il était encore vivant lorsque les clous et crochets ont été enfoncés dans son corps.

languages.text: El hombre clavado al Aquila está completamente destrozado, como si alguien lo hubiera metido en una trituradora de rocas. A juzgar por los bordes de las heridas y la cantidad de sangre, los clavos y los ganchos le fueron insertados en vida.
languages.original_text: The man nailed to the Aquila is completely broken, as if somebody shoved him into a stone crusher. Judging by the edges of his wounds and the amount of blood, the nails and hooks were driven into his flesh when he was still alive.

traits.locale_text: El hombre clavado al Aquila está completamente destrozado, como si alguien lo hubiera metido en una trituradora de rocas. A juzgar por los bordes de las heridas y la cantidad de sangre, los clavos y los ganchos le fueron insertados en vida.

languages.text: Der Körper des Mannes, der an den Aquila genagelt wurde, ist vollkommen zerstört. Als hätte ihn jemand in einen Steinbrecher geworfen. Den Wundrändern und der Blutmenge nach zu urteilen, wurden die Nägel und Haken in sein Fleisch getrieben, als er noch am Leben war.
languages.original_text: The man nailed to the Aquila is completely broken, as if somebody shoved him into a stone crusher. Judging by the edges of his wounds and the amount of blood, the nails and hooks were driven into his flesh when he was still alive.

traits.locale_text: Der Körper des Mannes, der an den Aquila genagelt wurde, ist vollkommen zerstört. Als hätte ihn jemand in einen Steinbrecher geworfen. Den Wundrändern und der Blutmenge nach zu urteilen, wurden die Nägel und Haken in sein Fleisch getrieben, als er noch am Leben war.

languages.text: Çift Başlı Kartal'a çivilenmiş, sanki biri onu balyozla dövmüş gibi adam tamamen paramparça olmuş. Yaralarının kenarlarına ve kan miktarına bakılacak olursa kancalar bedenine takıldığında hâlâ hayattaymış.
languages.original_text: The man nailed to the Aquila is completely broken, as if somebody shoved him into a stone crusher. Judging by the edges of his wounds and the amount of blood, the nails and hooks were driven into his flesh when he was still alive.

traits.locale_text: Çift Başlı Kartal'a çivilenmiş, sanki biri onu balyozla dövmüş gibi adam tamamen paramparça olmuş. Yaralarının kenarlarına ve kan miktarına bakılacak olursa kancalar bedenine takıldığında hâlâ hayattaymış.
